name: Infrastructure Monitoring Agent
description: AI-powered infrastructure monitoring agent with anomaly detection, predictive failure analysis, and intelligent alerting capabilities
author: Siva Nithish Kumar

capabilities.name: Monitor Infrastructure
capabilities.description: Comprehensive real-time infrastructure monitoring with health analysis and performance insights
examples: Monitor infrastructure health and performance across all services
Provide comprehensive status report with performance insights
Analyze current infrastructure metrics and identify issues
Generate infrastructure health dashboard with real-time metrics

capabilities.name: Detect Anomalies
capabilities.description: AI-powered anomaly detection with intelligent pattern recognition and severity classification

service_filter.description: Filter anomaly detection to specific services

include_predictions.description: Include impact predictions for detected anomalies

examples: Detect anomalies in service performance and behavior
Identify unusual patterns in infrastructure metrics
Analyze system behavior for abnormal conditions
Find performance anomalies with high confidence scores

capabilities.name: Predict Failures
capabilities.description: Predictive failure analysis using machine learning models with proactive recommendations

risk_threshold.description: Minimum risk probability to include in predictions

examples: Predict potential system failures before they occur
Analyze failure risks and provide early warnings
Forecast resource exhaustion and capacity issues
